items.longDescription:
Roy Lichtenstein

Roy Lichtenstein was a forerunner and main figure in the pop art movement of the 1960’s. He established his vivid style by utilizing simple black outlines, bright primary colors found in ads and comics, and halftone dots used in newsprint. He is remembered fondly for depicting not only characters from comics, but also creating new works in his own style in dialogue with great historic artists like Picasso, Matisse, and Monet, among others.

© 2020 Estate of Roy Lichtenstein. All rights reserved.
Roy Lichtenstein™
items.name: MEN Roy Lichtenstein UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: UT brings you the art of Roy Lichtenstein, icon of pop art.

items.longDescription:
Andy Warhol / Jean-Michel Basquiat / Keith Haring

Andy Warhol, Basquiat and Keith Herring laid the foundations of the pop art world. It is a collection using their popular masterpieces that still do not fade.

Andy Warhol

As the preeminent American artist of the 20th Century, Andy Warhol challenged the world to see art differently. This product is produced under a license from The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc., a New York not-for-profit corporation which promotes the visual arts.

©/®/™ The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc.

items.longDescription:
TOKYO UT

A collaboration between UT and four Japanese artists active in Japan and overseas, centered on the keyword “TOKYO.” This collection expresses the individual sensibilities of artists Meguru Yamaguchi, Kosuke Kawamura, FACE Oka, and YOSHIROTTEN.

YOSHIROTTEN

YOSHIROTTEN is a graphic artist and art director, based in Tokyo. He works across a wide spectrum of fields, including graphics, moving images, 3D works, installations and music. In 2018, after holding solo shows in London and Berlin, he mounted a massive exhibition of his works, titled “FUTURE NATURE” in Tokyo.

©YOSHIROTTEN
items.name: Tokyo UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: New “TOKYO” tees featuring designs from four up-and-coming Japanese artists

items.longDescription:
Mickey Motifs

Mickey Mouse has long been known for his iconic red shorts with two buttons, large yellow shoes, and white gloves. Then one day Mickey Mouse fell asleep and had a dream where his clothing came to life and began to move freely! This collection is inspired by a magical dream.

©Disney
items.name: Mickey Motifs UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: In Mickey Mouse’s dream, his shoes and gloves start moving about freely! Introducing a fantasy-filled UT collection.

items.longDescription:
Haruki Murakami / Murakami Radio

Haruki Murakami is a Japanese author with fans all over the world. His novels, such as “Norwegian Wood” and “1Q84”, are widely recognized. This UT collection showcases the world of his masterpiece novels and his love for music as expressed on “Murakami Radio”.

© Haruki Murakami 2021
©Maki Sasaki 2021 by Medialynx Japan

- 100% cotton workwear shirt.
- Stand collar shirt with two chest pockets.
- Oversized, boxy fit.
items.name: MEN Oversized Stand Collar Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Workwear style shirt with chest pockets. Soft 100% cotton.

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- We’ve updated our timeless straight collar poplin shirt for a new season.
- Now pre-washed and slightly brushed for a distinctive feel.
items.name: MEN Broadcloth Regular Collar Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: A soft shirt with a distinctive texture.

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Newly updated for a modern, sophisticated look.
- Premium cotton fabric with a brushed lining.
- Relaxed cut in crisp fabric.
- Features vintage track pant details and cut.
- Woven fabric inside the waist prevents pilling for greater durability.
- The sleek look means these pants are perfect for going out and about.
items.name: MEN Sweat Trousers
items.shortDescription: Smooth sweat pants with a warm brushed lining. A great option for wearing around the neighborhood.

items.composition: Body: 87% Cotton, 13% Polyester/ Rib: 89% Cotton, 11% Polyester
items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Now with dropped shoulders and a relaxed fit.
- Premium cotton fabric with a brushed lining.
- Classic hoodie details include a kangaroo pocket and double stitching.
- Hood drawstring with specially designed eyelets.
items.name: MEN Long Sleeve Sweat Pullover Hoodie
items.shortDescription: Updated fabric and cut for a modern style.

items.composition: Body: 75% Polyester, 25% Cotton/ Rib: 70% Polyester, 30% Cotton/ Hood Lining: 63% Polyester, 37% Cotton
items.longDescription:
- Newly updated with narrower tape for a more streamlined design.
- With quick-drying DRY technology.
- Stretch material allows easy movement.
- Zippered pocket for storage with a convenient pull tab.
- The sleeves have been redesigned with a slightly looser cut for easy movement.
- Featuring a hole and loop for earphones.
- A great choice for working out or to wear as athleisure.
items.name: MEN Dry Stretch Sweat Full-Zip Hoodie
items.shortDescription: A light, comfortable hoodie for an active lifestyle.

items.longDescription:
- With Cool Touch, absorbent, quick-drying, and moisture-wicking functions.
- Versatile design in basic colors.
items.name: AIRism Duvet Cover (Single)
items.shortDescription: For a cool, comfortable night’s sleep.
items.washingInformation:
Machine wash cold, gentle cycle
Do not tumble dry

items.composition: [09] Body: 79% Elastomultiester, 21% Polyester/ Side: 70% Elastomultiester, 30% Polyester [03, 69] Body: 61% Polyester, 39% Elastomultiester/ Side: 56% Polyester, 44% Elastomultiester
items.longDescription:
- Ultra stretch fabric with a stretch rate of over 1.5x horizontally and vertically, and a recovery rate of over 180%.
- Quick-drying functions approved by athletes. It dries in roughly half the time it takes for cotton to dry, so you stay feeling fresh.
- Sleek design with a more narrow-looking front zipper.
- Zip pocket that keeps things from falling out even while exercising.
- Used mesh fabric for the underarms to ensure breathability.
- Inserted gussets around the underarms to make it easier to raise and lower the arms.
items.name: MEN Ultra Stretch Active Jacket
items.shortDescription: A high-performance item approved by athletes. Stretchy and quick-drying, and made with convenient details.

items.longDescription:
- The front is made of authentic denim, while the back is made of ISKO denim that is comfortable to wear like sweats.
- The side that touches the skin uses rayon for the weft, so it is smooth and comfortable to wear.
Slim-fit tapered cut for a sleek look.
- Lined with an indigo-dyed slitted fabric.
- Removable drawstring so you can wear them without a belt.
- The back pocket is lined with two-ply fabric to increase durability.
- Produced with a waterless wash method developed independently by the Jeans Innovation Center, which reduces the use of water at the time of processing by 90% or more.
items.name: EZY Jeans
items.shortDescription: As comfortable as a sweatshirt but with a classic look. A new type of jeans that you will find yourself wearing again and again.

items.longDescription:
- Made with 13 ounce Kaihara denim.
- Shading, wrinkles, and glaze produced with the latest processing technology developed independently at our Jeans Innovation Center to give them a worn, vintage feel.
- With a vintage, lived-in feel.
- Produced with a waterless wash method developed independently by our Jeans Innovation Center that reduces the water used by 90% or more.
- Adjusted the angles of the back pockets and positioned the front pockets slightly higher up so that your legs look longer.
- A straight, leg-lengthening cut from the knee down to the hem.
- Mid-rise jeans that are comfortable and fit well.
- Carefully designed details, such as buttons, rivets, stitch color, and pocket lining that suit the vibe.
- Used a denim textile with a vertical grain for the back yoke to enhance comfort.
items.name: MEN Slim Fit Jeans
items.shortDescription: Slim-fit with an authentic denim-like look.

items.longDescription:
- Made with comfort stretch denim, they are both flexible and authentic looking.
- This season's updated design was to revise all the patterns including the knee position and creating a refined, slim, long, straight look.
- A little extra depth was added to the hips for better comfort.
- The front pockets are slightly higher and the back pocket angles have been adjusted to accentuate your legs.
- A proprietary and unique distressing process, developed by the Jean Innovation Center's cutting-edge technology and jean-processing specialists, creates a timeworn, authentic look and feel.
- The buttons and rivet colors are made with natural, worn-in plating, so you'll love the details.
items.name: MEN Slim Fit Jeans
items.shortDescription: Combines comfort with an authentic texture. The patterns and details have been reviewed and further improved.

items.freeInformation:
Manufactured by
Tangerine Design Pvt. Ltd.

items.longDescription:
- Made with leather from the famous Italian manufacturer, Volpi.
- Thick areas feature a vintage finish with moderate wrinkles on the surface.
- Since each piece becomes wrinkled with time, each piece is unique.
- The texture and look of the leather will increase as you use it.
items.name: MEN Italian Leather Vintage Belt
items.shortDescription: High-quality belt made with Italian leather. A vintage-inspired casual look.
